content.data: Remove Toe Kick from Cut List but Not Graphically
I do not want Front Toe on my cut list,  however , I do want the toe to display on my elevation and perspective views. How would I go about accomplishing this?
You could write a UCS similar to:

The EDX variable is added to the DX value when the part is sent to the cut list. It is a way of having the size on the cut list different than the graphic. In this case the EDX will cancel out the DX leaving a result of 0. If either, DX, DY, or DZ of
    a part is 0 then the part is not output to the cut list.
This method will not function for Parts whose Material includes a Model, Models can not be re-sized.

You could create a Miscellaneous Material in the  Material Manager  and give it the correct thickness and call it "Front Toe". Apply
    this Material to your Toe Parts in your  Material Schedules . Then it has a length but you will not see it on your cut list.
